content:
# The attempt to craft a Stone Furnace failed because there is not enough stone in the inventory. 
# Since I need stone to craft the furnace, I will need to gather some stone first. 

# I will locate the nearest stone resource patch and move to it to gather the required stone.

stone_patch_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Find the position of the nearest stone patch
move_to(stone_patch_position)  # Move to the stone patch location

# Now I'll harvest some stone from the patch to gather enough for crafting the Stone Furnace.
harvested_stone_quantity = harvest_resource(stone_patch_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 stone

# Finally, I will check the inventory to see the updated state after harvesting stone.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting stone: {inspect_inventory()}")
